title: LumiFusion Tech
subtitle: Illustrator, Figma
summary: LumiFusion Tech is an innovative, forward-thinking technology company specializing in renewable energy solutions, including solar panels, wind turbines, and energy storage systems. The company is committed to sustainability and aims to provide eco-friendly and cost-effective energy solutions for a brighter and greener future.

title: Global Music Festival
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design a series of posters for an international music festival featuring diverse genres and cultures. Each poster should visually represent a different musical style, while maintaining a cohesive overall theme for the event.

title: Cosmic Coffee Co.
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design innovative and visually striking packaging for a specialty coffee brand that focuses on ethically sourced beans from around the world. The packaging should reflect the uniqueness of each coffee's origin and flavor profile.

title: Adventure Explorer Magazine
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design a magazine spread for an adventure travel publication. Create a layout that effectively balances captivating imagery, informative text, and a clear visual hierarchy to entice readers to explore new destinations.

title: Healthy Habits Institute
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Create an infographic for an organization dedicated to promoting healthy habits. Visualize statistics and tips related to exercise, nutrition, and mental wellness in an engaging and easily understandable format.

title: Artisan Craft Marketplace
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design the user interface for an online platform that connects artisans with customers seeking handmade crafts. Focus on creating an intuitive and visually appealing interface that enhances the user experience.

title: Fitness Companion App
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design a set of app icons for a fitness tracking application. Create icons that represent different activities (e.g., running, yoga, weightlifting) while maintaining a consistent visual style.

title: Columbus Blue Jackets Re-imagine
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: The Columbus Blue Jackets, a professional ice hockey team, are seeking a fresh and modern redesign of their existing logo. As they continue to establish themselves as a prominent team in the NHL, they aim to capture the essence of their team identity while resonating with fans both old and new. This logo redesign project presents an exciting opportunity to reimagine their visual representation and create a logo that embodies their team's spirit, values, and connection to the city of Columbus.

title: EcoCycle Cleaning Products
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Redesign the packaging for a line of environmentally friendly cleaning products. Transform the packaging into a visual representation of eco-consciousness and cleanliness.

title: Sports Logos
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Welcome to my Sports Logos portfolio section, where I showcase a variety of logos designed for sports teams and brands. From professional franchises to local clubs, each logo reflects a unique blend of creativity, team identity, and the dynamic energy of sports. Explore this collection to see how I've translated the essence of each sport into distinctive and impactful visual identities.

title: Uncommon TeamWear
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Uncommon TeamWear, a dynamic sports uniform and apparel company, is embarking on a website design project to revamp their online presence and create an immersive digital experience for their customers. This project aims to showcase their diverse range of high-quality sportswear products, emphasize their commitment to innovative design, and provide a seamless platform for teams and individuals to explore, customize, and order personalized uniforms and apparel.

title: Music Streaming Platform
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design a visually appealing interface for a music streaming platform. Focus on creating an immersive experience for users to explore playlists, discover new artists, and enjoy seamless playback.

title: Real Estate Listing Platform
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Design a user-centric real estate listings platform. Create an easy-to-navigate interface that showcases property details, high-quality images, interactive maps, and contact options for potential buyers.

title: Task Management Application
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Create a task management app to help individuals stay organized. Design a user-friendly interface for creating tasks, setting deadlines, prioritizing, and tracking progress.

title: Recipe Sharing Application
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Create a platform for food enthusiasts to share and discover recipes. Design an interface that focuses on visually appealing recipe cards, easy search options, and user interaction.

title: Dashboard Design for Analytics
subtitle: Java, AndroidX, AndroidStudio
summary: Develop a comprehensive dashboard for a data analytics platform. Design visualizations that effectively communicate data trends and insights to users, enhancing their decision-making process.
